text: The 1947–48 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team represented the University of California, Los Angeles during the 1947–48 NCAA men's basketball season and were members of the Pacific Coast Conference. The Bruins were led by ninth year head coach Wilbur Johns. They finished the regular season with a record of 12–13 and were third in the PCC southern division with a record of 3–9. ==Previous season== The Bruins finished the regular season with a record of 18–7 and won the PCC southern division with a record of 9–3. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style=|Regular Season Source ==References== Category:UCLA Bruins men's basketball seasons Ucla UCLA Bruins Basketball UCLA Bruins Basketball
title: 1947–48 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team
